New Records: Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill shared a 165-run opening partnership to set up the win
Key Match Events: Shimron Hetmyer scored a half-century (61) for West Indies
Shai Hope scored a 29-ball 45 for West Indies
Odean Smith scored a late cameo (15 not out) for West Indies
Yashasvi Jaiswal (84 not out) and Shubman Gill (77) shared a 165-run opening partnership for India
Romario Shepherd took the wicket of Shubman Gill for West Indies
Pre-Game Insights: Rovman Powell (West Indies captain) said they will bat first and try to put up some runs on the board
Hardik Pandya (India captain) said they would have batted first as well, but the same team will play
Jason Holder is likely to return for the hosts (West Indies)
Shubman Gill is likely to retain his place in the side
Umran Malik might get a look in the playing XI
Post-Match Reflections: India beat West Indies by 9 wickets to level the series 2-2
Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill were the standout performers for India
Shimron Hetmyer and Shai Hope scored half-centuries for West Indies
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Central Broward Regional Park Stadium Turf Ground in Lauderhill, Florida
The weather in Florida was cloudy in the morning, but there was not much chance of rain
The toss was important in this venue as the teams who have batted first in this ground have won 11 out of 13 matches
